posts.post_title: FS (Price reduced) - T206 Hugh Duffy American Beauty 460 SGC 1
posts.post_content: For Sale - T206 Hugh Duffy American Beauty 460 SGC 1.  $400 venmo or zelle, $417.50 if you prefer pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note:  NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.
